data.name: Tarot Readings Premium
data.detailed_description:
Use the educational software 'Tarot of Marseilles' card readings to control your future and fate!

Specially designed for high resolution computer screens!

Until now, other tarot apps had poor graphics and ugly layouts when running on high-end computers. Not anymore, this App goes up to Full HD graphics and displays perfectly on all computer monitors and laptop screens. Just try it out and see for yourself.

Professional Tarot-reading experience.

Why just read the cards and the explanations when you can have the full Tarot experience? With our beautiful 2D cartoon graphics, you will feel like you are visiting a real Gypsy Tarot Reader. She will shuffle the cards, let you choose them and then present them and explain their meanings. This is the most beautiful and fully animated Tarot card experience out there. The main deck style used is Grimaud’s (1930) version of the famous Tarot of Marseilles.

Simple, easy to use and fast. Great for beginners.

Anyone can use the App very easily. First, you will have to write your Tarot question, such as: ‘How can I be a better wife?’ or ‘What do I need to do to have a chance with John?’. Then you choose the cards and that’s it! After that, the Gypsy Tarot Reader explains each card in detail. There is also a summary at the end of the reading. All readings are SAVED to view them as many times as you like.

Pro Tarot Algorithms & Multi-language.

Not only are there detailed explanations for each card, the neighbor cards are examined as well to find ‘Well-dignified’ or ‘Ill-dignified’ cards. Reversed cards and ‘Pairs’ with others cards are also found. All these details are explained easily and quickly in your own native language: English, Greek, German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish and Russian.

Zoom and examine each card.

Sometimes a card looks really amazing and you might want to zoom in and get a closer look. No problem, just tap the card and zoom/move it around for as long as you like.

Features:
► 4 card spreads: The simple one, the professional Celtic cross spread (10 cards), a detailed Romance spread (7 cards) and a detailed Career spread (7 cards).
► 4 card decks (total 4x78 HD cards), both Trumps and Suits. The ‘Noblet’ historic deck made in 1650 (one of the earliest decks of the Tarot of Marseilles), the ‘Dodal’ deck from 1715 and the famous ‘Conver ‘deck from 1760 (one of the most popular early Marseilles decks).
► Compare each card from all 4 decks at the same time, while zooming. (Access the zoom screen by clicking the top left icon)
► Register up to 3 different users in the same App. Save readings for all 3 users (3x6=18 saves).

data.short_description: Use Tarot of Marseilles Professional / Educational card readings to control your future and fate! With our beautiful 2D cartoon graphics, you will feel like you are visiting a real Gypsy Tarot Reader. She will shuffle the cards, let you choose them and then present them and explain their meanings.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Portuguese, Russian
data.reviews:
“This is the most stunning tarot application I have seen. Beautiful user interface with attention to every detail.”
10/10 – pdasnews

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 176 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 176 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
